verses.verse: Now <S%H428>these<s%> are the ones who <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> at <S%H6860>Ziklag,<s%> while he was <S%H5750>still<s%> <S%H6113>restricted<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7027>Kish;<s%> and they were among the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>men<s%> who <S%H5826>helped<s%> [him] in <S%H4421>war.<s%>

They were <S%H9349>equipped<s%> with <S%H7198>bows,<s%> using both the <S%H3231>right<s%> <S%H3231>hand<s%> and the <S%H8041>left<s%> [to sling] <S%H68>stones<s%> and [to shoot] <S%H2671>arrows<s%> from the <S%H7198>bow;<s%> [they were] Saul's <S%H251>kinsmen<s%> from <S%H1144>Benjamin.<s%>

The <S%H7218>chief<s%> was <S%H295>Ahiezer,<s%> then <S%H3060>Joash,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8094>Shemaah<s%> the <S%H1395>Gibeathite;<s%> and <S%H3149>Jeziel<s%> and <S%H6404>Pelet,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5820>Azmaveth,<s%> and <S%H1294>Beracah<s%> and <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> the <S%H6069>Anathothite,<s%>

and <S%H3460>Ishmaiah<s%> the <S%H1393>Gibeonite,<s%> a <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>man<s%> among the <S%H7970>thirty,<s%> and <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H7970>thirty.<s%> Then <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> <S%H3166>Jahaziel,<s%> <S%H3076>Johanan,<s%> <S%H3107>Jozabad<s%> the <S%H1452>Gederathite,<s%>
<S%H498>Eluzai,<s%> <S%H3406>Jerimoth,<s%> <S%H1183>Bealiah,<s%> <S%H8114>Shemariah,<s%> <S%H8203>Shephatiah<s%> the <S%H2741>Haruphite,<s%>
<S%H511>Elkanah,<s%> <S%H3449>Isshiah,<s%> <S%H5832>Azarel,<s%> <S%H3134>Joezer,<s%> <S%H3434>Jashobeam,<s%> the <S%H7145>Korahites,<s%>
and <S%H3132>Joelah<s%> and <S%H2069>Zebadiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3395>Jeroham<s%> of <S%H1446>Gedor.<s%>

And from the <S%H1425>Gadites<s%> there <S%H914>came<s%> <S%H914>over<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> in the <S%H4679>stronghold<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor,<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H6635>trained<s%> for <S%H4421>war,<s%> who could <S%H6186>handle<s%> <S%H6793>shield<s%> and <S%H7420>spear,<s%> and whose <S%H6440>faces<s%> were like the <S%H6440>faces<s%> of <S%H9030>lions,<s%> and [they were] as <S%H4116>swift<s%> as the <S%H6643>gazelles<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains.<s%>
<S%H5829>Ezer<s%> [was] the <S%H7218>first,<s%> <S%H5662>Obadiah<s%> the <S%H8145>second,<s%> <S%H446>Eliab<s%> the <S%H7992>third,<s%>
<S%H4925>Mishmannah<s%> the <S%H7243>fourth,<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H2549>fifth,<s%>
<S%H6262>Attai<s%> the <S%H8345>sixth,<s%> <S%H447>Eliel<s%> the <S%H7637>seventh,<s%>
<S%H3076>Johanan<s%> the <S%H8066>eighth,<s%> <S%H443>Elzabad<s%> the <S%H8671>ninth,<s%>
<S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H6224>tenth,<s%> <S%H4344>Machbannai<s%> the <S%H6249>eleventh.<s%> <S%H6240><s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> were <S%H7218>captains<s%> of the <S%H6635>army;<s%> he who was <S%H6996>least<s%> was equal to a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and the <S%H1419>greatest<s%> to a <S%H505>thousand.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H1992>ones<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5674>crossed<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> when it was <S%H4390>overflowing<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H1415>banks<s%> and they <S%H1272>put<s%> to <S%H1272>flight<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> those in the <S%H6010>valleys,<s%> both to the <S%H4217>east<s%> and to the <S%H4628>west.<s%>
Then <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4679>stronghold<s%> to <S%H1732>David.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out to <S%H6440>meet<s%> them, and <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H518>"If<s%> you <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H7965>peacefully<s%> to me to <S%H5826>help<s%> me, my <S%H3824>heart<s%> shall be <S%H3162>united<s%> with you; but <S%H518>if<s%> to <S%H7411>betray<s%> me to my <S%H6862>adversaries,<s%> since there is <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2555>wrong<s%> in my <S%H3709>hands,<s%> may the <S%H430>God<s%> of our fathers <S%H1>look<s%> on [it] and <S%H7200>decide.<s%>"

Then the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> <S%H3847>came<s%> upon <S%H6022>Amasai,<s%> who was the <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H7970>thirty,<s%> [and he said,] "[We] are yours, O <S%H1732>David,<s%> And with you, O <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse!<s%> <S%H7965>Peace,<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> to you, And <S%H7965>peace<s%> to him who <S%H5826>helps<s%> you; <S%H3588>Indeed,<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5826>helps<s%> you!" Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6901>received<s%> them and <S%H5414>made<s%> them <S%H7218>captains<s%> of the <S%H1416>band.<s%>

From <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> also <S%H4480>some<s%> <S%H5307>defected<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> when he was about to <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H4421>battle<s%> with the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H7586>Saul.<s%> But they did not <S%H5826>help<s%> them, for the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> after <S%H6098>consultation<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> him <S%H7971>away,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "At [the cost of] our <S%H7218>heads<s%> he may <S%H5307>defect<s%> to his <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H7586>Saul.<s%>"

As he <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H6860>Ziklag,<s%> there <S%H5307>defected<s%> to him from <S%H4519>Manasseh:<s%> <S%H5734>Adnah,<s%> <S%H3107>Jozabad,<s%> <S%H3043>Jediael,<s%> <S%H4317>Michael,<s%> <S%H3107>Jozabad,<s%> <S%H453>Elihu,<s%> and <S%H6769>Zillethai,<s%> <S%H7218>captains<s%> of <S%H505>thousands<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> belonged to <S%H4519>Manasseh.<s%>

And they <S%H5826>helped<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H1416>band<s%> of <S%H1416>raiders,<s%> for they were <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor,<s%> and were <S%H8269>captains<s%> in the <S%H6635>army.<s%>

For <S%H3117>day<s%> by <S%H3117>day<s%> [men] <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> to <S%H5826>help<s%> him, <S%H5704>until<s%> there was a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4264>army<s%> like the <S%H4264>army<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

Now <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H4557>numbers<s%> of the <S%H7218>divisions<s%> <S%H9139>equipped<s%> for <S%H6635>war,<s%> who <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> at <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> to <S%H5437>turn<s%> the <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to him, according to the <S%H6310>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> who <S%H5375>bore<s%> <S%H6793>shield<s%> and <S%H7420>spear<s%> [were] 6800, <S%H9139>equipped<s%> for <S%H6635>war.<s%>
Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor<s%> for <S%H6635>war,<s%> 7100.
Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> 4600.
Now <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> was the <S%H5057>leader<s%> of [the house of] <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and with him were 3700,
also <S%H6659>Zadok,<s%> a <S%H5288>young<s%> <S%H5288>man<s%> <S%H1368>mighty<s%> of <S%H2428>valor,<s%> and of his father's <S%H1004>house<s%> twenty-two <S%H8269>captains.<s%>

And of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%>'s <S%H251>kinsmen,<s%> 3000; for <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H2008>now<s%> the <S%H4768>greatest<s%> <S%H4768>part<s%> of them had <S%H8104>kept<s%> their <S%H4931>allegiance<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of Saul.
And of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> 20800, <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor,<s%> <S%H8034>famous<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> in their fathers' <S%H1004>households.<s%>
And of the half-tribe of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> 18000, <S%H834>who<s%> were <S%H9344>designated<s%> by <S%H8034>name<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H4427>make<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4427>king.<s%>

And of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> men who <S%H998>understood<s%> the <S%H6256>times,<s%> with <S%H3045>knowledge<s%> of <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> should <S%H6213>do,<s%> their <S%H7218>chiefs<s%> were two <S%H3967>hundred;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H251>kinsmen<s%> were at their <S%H6310>command.<s%>

Of <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> there were 50000 who <S%H3318>went<s%> out in the <S%H6635>army,<s%> who could <S%H6186>draw<s%> up in <S%H4421>battle<s%> <S%H6186>formation<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> kinds of <S%H3627>weapons<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> and <S%H9385>helped<s%> [David] with an <S%H3808>undivided<s%> <S%H3820><s%> <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
And of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> [there were] 1000 <S%H8269>captains,<s%> and with them 37000 with <S%H6793>shield<s%> and <S%H2595>spear.<s%>
And of the <S%H1839>Danites<s%> who could <S%H6186>draw<s%> up in <S%H4421>battle<s%> <S%H6186>formation,<s%> [there were] 28600.
And of <S%H836>Asher<s%> [there were] 40000 who <S%H3318>went<s%> out in the <S%H6635>army<s%> to <S%H6186>draw<s%> up in <S%H4421>battle<s%> <S%H6186>formation.<s%>

And from the <S%H5676>other<s%> <S%H5676>side<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> of the <S%H7206>Reubenites<s%> and the <S%H1425>Gadites<s%> and of the half-tribe of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> [there were] 120000 with <S%H3605>all<s%> [kinds] of <S%H3627>weapons<s%> of <S%H6635>war<s%> for the <S%H4421>battle.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H428>these,<s%> being <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> who could <S%H6186>draw<s%> up in <S%H4634>battle<s%> <S%H4634>formation,<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> with a <S%H8003>perfect<s%> <S%H3824>heart,<s%> to <S%H4427>make<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7611>rest<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3820>mind<s%> to <S%H4427>make<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4427>king.<s%>

And they were <S%H8033>there<s%> with <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H398>eating<s%> and <S%H8354>drinking;<s%> for their <S%H251>kinsmen<s%> had <S%H3559>prepared<s%> for them.

Moreover those who were <S%H7138>near<s%> to them, [even] as <S%H5704>far<s%> as <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> and <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> and <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H3899>food<s%> on <S%H2543>donkeys,<s%> <S%H1581>camels,<s%> <S%H6505>mules,<s%> and on <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> <S%H7230>great<s%> <S%H7230>quantities<s%> of <S%H7058>flour<s%> <S%H7058>cakes,<s%> <S%H1690>fig<s%> <S%H1690>cakes<s%> and <S%H6778>bunches<s%> of <S%H6778>raisins,<s%> <S%H3196>wine,<s%> <S%H8081>oil,<s%> <S%H1241>oxen<s%> and <S%H6629>sheep.<s%> There was <S%H8057>joy<s%> <S%H3588>indeed<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
